attributes.action: Stop the planned closure of Hinckley Post Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the planned closure of Hinckley Station Street Post Office. Many rural post offices have already been shut. Closing our main Post Office will damage both local business and our community.

We will campaign against this closure and will vote for local candidates who oppose the plans. We will call on the community to consider a boycott of any shop or business that assists in closing our Post Office.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
